articles.title: Coronavirus has been 'catastrophic' for cancer care in Europe, WHO warns - Daily Mail
articles.description: Dr Hans Kluge, regional director for Europe at the World Health Organization, warned death rates from cancer will surge in the coming years because of delays to scans and treatment in the pandemic.
articles.content:
